description:
My place is close to Astoria Park, Astoria Park Pool, express bus to Manhattan and  just few blocks to N, Q trains and express bus to 7 train and Queensboro bridge. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the coziness, the light, and the kitchen. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).

Is a beautiful 1 bedroom first floor  apartment, the living room has a room divider that accommodates comfortably a twin size bed, the futon can be used as an extra bed, access to a full kitchen.  My place is  cozy and tidy is located in a very quiet and safe area of Astoria, you will find fine cuisine and bars just  at walking distance .
name: Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment
